default: return 'bg-gray-100 text-gray-800'; } }; const getTypeIcon = (type) => { switch (type) { case 'incident': return 'âš ï¸'; case 'weekly': return 'ðŸ“…'; case 'monthly': return 'ðŸ“Š'; case 'evacuation': return 'ðŸš¨'; case 'evacuation': return 'from-orange-500 to-red-500'; default: return 'from-gray-500 to-gray-600'; } }; return (
